all_questions.question: What is the first step in the proposed speech translation system?
all_questions.context: We really should get a great speech translation system.

all_questions.question: How does the machine translation part of the system work?
all_questions.context: So the idea would be to run ASR on the sound that you want to translate and then you would run the machine translation...

all_questions.context: ...and that the superhuman interpretation of what has been said.
